name: GridMech
description:
Made for the Dungeon Crawler VR Game Jam 2021.

It's way more rough than I was hoping for, all those little things I thought were working until the moment I tried building and submitting.

Playable with or without VR.

It might be a little buggy, but you can use the virtual joystick in the cockpit. Using your vr controller, grab the joystick with the grip button and move it to move the mech. The trigger button fires. To vent heat grab the throttle-looking lever on the left side of the cockpit and pull it towards you.

Uses the following Unity packages and assets:
Mech Construction Packs by Slava Z.
Hi-Rez Spaceships Creator
Post-Apo Pack
VR Interaction Framework
Dungeon Architect
Octave3D-Level Design
A* Pathfinding Project Pro
Master Audio: AAA Sound
Feel
Pool Kit - The Ultimate Pooling System For Unity
